CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper August 18, 1945, pg. 19, reads: "Send-Off Party - Mr. and Mrs. Harry Clark and Mr. and Mrs. Henry G. Pulley were hosts at a grand send-off party in honor of Sgt. Clarence Nolan. The delightful get-together was held at the home of the Pulleys, 617 Madison Avenue, Bellevue. Sergeant Nolan is being redeployed to the Pacific, after a year in France and Belgium. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Guests, including Harry Clark, Mrs. Clark, Henry G. Pulley and Mrs. Pulley gathered for send-off party for Sergeant Clarence Nolan in Pulley home 617 Madison Avenue, Bellevue
